com.beaglebuddy.mpeg.pojo

Class ReplayGain

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.beaglebuddy.mpeg.pojo.ReplayGain

  • public class ReplayGain
extends java.lang.Object
    LAME header replay gain inforamtion. The gain replay contains information which can be used to make all the .mp3 files in your collection the same loudness. This " volume normalizing" process can be performed by tools like MP3 Gain.
    See Also:
    LAMEHeader, LAME Header Format

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReplayGain

        public ReplayGain(GainType type,
          GainOriginator originator,
          boolean sign,
          int gain)
        constructor.
        Parameters:
        type - type of replay gain.
        originator - who set the replay gain.
        sign - true indicates an increase in volume, while false indicates a decrease in volume.
        gain - amount of gain to add/remove.
